name: Al and the Basement (Prototype)
description:
You play as a robotic hero Al trying to get to the goal in each level. The goal is a vent that leads to the next area. Each area is a small puzzle that must be solved to get to the next area.

Controls:
Arrow Keys/WASD: Moves character
Left Mouse: Use Reticle

Note:

This is the Prototype of a game still in development. The plan is to revamp everything at a later date after getting some feedback.

Major update is planned in Mid-April.
